name: Trioss: Match the cards - The brain game when Sudoku, Mastermind, Wordfeud and Kakuro are too easy
name_original: Trioss: Match the cards - The brain game when Sudoku, Mastermind, Wordfeud and Kakuro are too easy
description:
***** "I love this game - can't put it down!!! Much better than candy crush - really makes you think!" CindyWings
***** "Great! - Really amazing and addictive brain game! I love it!" M.Soare
***** "First you think: This is really easy. But with every level you get unexpected and exciting tasks. Excellent brain training. Highly recommended." - J.Becker

The game for the whole family, just as much fun for the children, parents and grand-parents.
Everyone can play Trioss; the game trains your visual perception and concentration.

The addictive game to train your brain!
Easy to understand, but challenging to play.

Find the three cards that are either all the same - or all different.
Sounds easy? Try it when the clock is running....

Master 8 single-user game types with several levels of difficulty, or play it with your family or friends where you take turns and try to match their capabilities.

Play alone:
- Trioss beginner, Advanced, Expert
- Beat the clock, Race through the levels
- Relax mode - without points and time pressure

or play with friends. Challenge them to find Trioss as quickly as you can. Choose among all game levels to find the one that suits you the best.


- If you find it too difficult, you can buy hints, or use the Trioss Assistance to show you where your mistakes are.

- Turn on the "Check Trioss Automatically" function and see your scores improve.

- Earn Coins to get hints or use assistance.

- Register your scores on Game Center and challenge your friends online.
